name: VA: Veteran Readiness And Employment (vr&e)
description: Employment support for service members and veterans with a disability that limits their ability to work.
fullDescription: Employment support for service members and veterans with a disability that limits their ability to work.
whatTheyOffer: Provides a wide range of benefits in support of veterans, service members, and their families.
howToGetIt:
Eligibility requirements:
- The applicant has a disability or impairment
- The applicant served in the active military
- The applicant's service status is: active-duty service member or honorable, general or other than dishonorable discharge
- The applicantâ€™s disability was caused or made worse by their active-duty military service

Visit the official website or call for more information.
